title: You Need To Know Frontend First
subtitle: FRONTEND
details: The part of a website that the user interacts directly is termed as front end. It is also referred to as the ‘client side’ of the application.

title: First Learn HTML
subtitle: HTML
details: HTML (Hyper Text Markup Language) is a web-based  language that tells your browser how to showcase text and images on a webpage. You use tags to indicate the various elements, determine the placement of paragraphs, headings, add images and videos.

title: Learn The Basics
subtitle: BASICS OF HTML
details: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It is used on the frontend and gives the structure to the webpage which you can style using CSS and make interactive using JavaScript.

title: UNDERSTAND WHAT IS SEMANTIC HTML
subtitle: SEMANTIC HTML
details: Semantic element clearly describes its meaning to both the browser and the developer.

title: Learn Forms And Its Validation
subtitle: FORMS AND VALIDATIONS
details: Before submitting data to the server, it is important to ensure all required form controls are filled out, in the correct format. This is called client-side form validation, and helps ensure data submitted matches the requirements set forth in the various form controls.

title: Learn How To Mentain HTML Documents
subtitle: BEST PRACTICES
details: Learn to follow the best practices for writing maintainable and scalable

title: Learn CSS
subtitle: CSS
details: CSS or Cascading Style Sheets adds styling such as fonts, colours or layouts to your website making the website more aesthetically pleasing. Therefore, HTML allows you to build the structure of your website and CSS makes that structure come to life

title: Learn Basics Of CSS
subtitle: BASICS
details: CSS or Cascading Style Sheets is the language used to style the frontend of any website. CSS is a cornerstone technology of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and JavaScript

title: LEARN TO MAKE DIFFERENT LAYOUTS
subtitle: MAKING LAYOUTS
details: Float, grid, flexbox, positioning, display and box model are some of the key topics that are used for making layouts

title: LEARN HOW TO MAKE YOUR WEB DESIGN RESPONSIVE
subtitle: RESPONSIVE WEB DESIGN
details: Responsive Web Designing is the technique to make your webpages look good on all screen sizes. There are certain techniques used to achieve that e.g. CSS media queries, percentage widths, min or max widths heights etc.

title: LEARN BOOTSTRAP
subtitle: BOOTSTRAP
details: Bootstrap is a potent front-end framework used to create modern websites and web apps. It's open-source and free to use, yet features numerous HTML and CSS templates for UI interface elements such as buttons and forms. Bootstrap also supports JavaScript extensions.

title: WHAT IS PROGRAMMING?
subtitle: Understanding Backend
details: Programming is the process of giving machines a set of instructions that describe how a program should be carried out. Programmers will spend their whole careers learning a variety of programming languages and tools so they can effectively build computer programs.
